scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.dev:api: npm run configure:api && (cd apps/api/v1 && PYTHONPATH=../../.. pdm run uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload)
scripts.api: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run python start.py
scripts.supabase:migrate:new: echo 'Enter migration name (e.g., add_user_profiles):' && read MIGRATION_NAME && supabase db remote commit -f "$MIGRATION_NAME"
scripts.supabase:db:reset:remote: echo 'WARNING: This will reset your linked REMOTE database and re-run all migrations. For dev/staging ONLY. Type YES to confirm:' && read CONFIRM && [ "$CONFIRM" = "YES" ] && supabase db reset --linked || echo 'Reset cancelled.'
scripts.test:e2e:blog-post: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run pytest tests/integration/agents/marketing/blog_post/test_blog_post_service.py -k test_create_and_get_blog_post_task_e2e -m e2e
scripts.test:e2e:leads: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run pytest apps/api/tests/integration/agents/marketing/leads/test_leads_service.py::test_create_and_get_leads_task_e2e -m e2e
scripts.test:e2e:content: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run pytest apps/api/tests/integration/agents/marketing/content/test_content_service.py::test_create_and_get_content_task_e2e -m e2e
scripts.test:e2e:onboarding: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run pytest apps/api/tests/integration/agents/hr/onboarding/test_onboarding_service.py::test_create_and_get_onboarding_task_e2e -m e2e
scripts.test:e2e:internal-rag: cd apps/api && python3 -m pdm run pytest apps/api/tests/integration/agents/business/internal_rag/test_internal_rag_service.py::test_create_and_get_internal_rag_task_e2e -m e2e
